# azure-network Reference

This directory contains 29 icons extracted from `azure-network.excalidrawlib`.

## Available Icons

| Icon Name                    | Filename                                  |
| ---------------------------- | ----------------------------------------- |
| App Gateways                 | `icons/App-Gateways.json`                 |
| App Security Groups          | `icons/App-Security-Groups.json`          |
| Azure Synapse Analytics      | `icons/Azure-Synapse-Analytics.json`      |
| Bastions                     | `icons/Bastions.json`                     |
| Connections                  | `icons/Connections.json`                  |
| DDos Protection Plans        | `icons/DDos-Protection-Plans.json`        |
| DNS ZOnes                    | `icons/DNS-ZOnes.json`                    |
| Firewall Manager             | `icons/Firewall-Manager.json`             |
| Firewall Policies            | `icons/Firewall-Policies.json`            |
| Firewalls                    | `icons/Firewalls.json`                    |
| Front Door                   | `icons/Front-Door.json`                   |
| IP Groups                    | `icons/IP-Groups.json`                    |
| Load Balancers               | `icons/Load-Balancers.json`               |
| Local Gateways               | `icons/Local-Gateways.json`               |
| NAT Gateways                 | `icons/NAT-Gateways.json`                 |
| Network Interfaces           | `icons/Network-Interfaces.json`           |
| Network Security Groups      | `icons/Network-Security-Groups.json`      |
| Network Watcher              | `icons/Network-Watcher.json`              |
| Private DNS                  | `icons/Private-DNS.json`                  |
| Private Link                 | `icons/Private-Link.json`                 |
| Public IP Addresses          | `icons/Public-IP-Addresses.json`          |
| Public IP Prefixes           | `icons/Public-IP-Prefixes.json`           |
| Route Tables                 | `icons/Route-Tables.json`                 |
| Service Plane Endpoint       | `icons/Service-Plane-Endpoint.json`       |
| Traffic Manager Profiles     | `icons/Traffic-Manager-Profiles.json`     |
| Virtual Gateways             | `icons/Virtual-Gateways.json`             |
| Virtual Network              | `icons/Virtual-Network.json`              |
| Virtual WANS                 | `icons/Virtual-WANS.json`                 |
| Web Application Firewall WAF | `icons/Web-Application-Firewall-WAF.json` |

## Usage

Each icon JSON file contains the complete `elements` array needed to render that icon in Excalidraw.
You can copy the elements from these files into your Excalidraw diagrams.
